name: Rebirth of the Strongest Sword God
author: Yu Cheng
content: The top player of the popular MMO, “Divine Realm”, Shi Feng, was betrayed by his club. He drank in sadness, but then woke up realizing he had gone back 10 years, to the time when Divine Realm had just released. Using the ten years of experience he had, he started all over to climb back to the top. This time, he intends to surpass himself and reach greater heights.
